meanings.definition: A person who grows grapes for making wine.
meanings.sent1: The winegrowers carefully tended to their grapevines, ensuring a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent2: The winegrowers in the region were known for producing high-quality wines.
meanings.sent3: The winegrowers decided to have a grape-stomping competition for some fun.
meanings.sent4: The winegrowers were the artists of the vineyards, painting the landscape with rows of grapevines.
meanings.sent5: The winegrowers' dedication and hard work resulted in delicious bottles of wine.

meanings.definition: The group of people who cultivate grapevines for wine production.
meanings.sent1: Local winegrowers gathered for a meeting to discuss the upcoming harvest.
meanings.sent2: The winegrowers worked together to ensure the success of the vineyard.
meanings.sent3: The winegrowers organized a grape-picking race for a bit of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The winegrowers were the backbone of the wine industry, supporting each other in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The winegrowers' unity and collaboration led to a thriving wine region.
